page.description: A Rich Text Object is a formatted text control that you can display on a layout.

section.title: Adding Rich Text Objects to a Layout
section.description: To create a Rich Text Object, you can either:

case.description: Use the Rich Text Tool on the Toolbox.

section.description: Once the text has been placed, you can set the following properties with the Properties Toolbar, or by right-clicking on the object to open the Properties dialog box.

case.description: Text alignment, font, size, color, character attributes (bold, italic, underline), and style
